div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 208 Aetolia?, 1957 Burial: end of 3rd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides, Picard) Contents: 11 AE Philip II: 1 Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 Antigonus Gonatas: 2 Demetrius II: 1 Aetolia: 2 Aetolia?: 1 Ambracia: 2 Stratus: 1 Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1958, p. 653, illus.
